We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AccelerationBands _abands;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_abands = ABANDS(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_abands.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ABANDS Middle Band", _abands.MiddleBand);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ABANDS Upper Band", _abands.UpperBand);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ABANDS Lower Band", _abands.LowerBand);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ABANDS Current", _abands.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.abands = self.ABANDS(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.abands.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ABANDS Middle Band", self.abands.MiddleBand);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ABANDS Upper Band", self.abands.UpperBand);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ABANDS Lower Band", self.abands.LowerBand);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ABANDS Current", self.abands.Current);
